## Discussion

The setter combines an array containing any number of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLQueryItem] key-value pairs into a query string and sets the `URLComponents` query property. This property assumes the query item names and values are already correctly percent-encoded. It also assumes that the query item names don’t contain the query item delimiter characters `&` and `=`. Attempting to set an incorrectly percent-encoded query item or a query item name with the query item delimiter characters `&` and `=` raises [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/fatalError(_:file:line:)].

# percentEncodedQueryItems

**Instance Property**

The query subcomponent, as an array of percent-encoded query items.

## Declaration

```swift
var percentEncodedQueryItems: [URLQueryItem]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The setter combines an array containing any number of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLQueryItem] key-value pairs into a query string and sets the `URLComponents` query property. This property assumes the query item names and values are already correctly percent-encoded. It also assumes that the query item names don’t contain the query item delimiter characters `&` and `=`. Attempting to set an incorrectly percent-encoded query item or a query item name with the query item delimiter characters `&` and `=` raises [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/fatalError(_:file:line:)].

## Accessing components in URL-encoded format

- **percentEncodedFragment**: The fragment subcomponent, percent-encoded.
- **percentEncodedHost**: The host subcomponent, percent-encoded.
- **percentEncodedPassword**: The password subcomponent, percent-encoded.
- **percentEncodedPath**: The path subcomponent, percent-encoded.
- **percentEncodedQuery**: The query subcomponent, percent-encoded.
- **URLQueryItem**: A single name-value pair from the query portion of a URL.
- **percentEncodedUser**: The user subcomponent, percent-encoded.

items.description: A single name-value pair from the query portion of a URL.
